synopses.ninety: David learns that Jamie has been hanging out with a violent dropout.
synopses.epg: David learns that Jamie has been hanging around with a violent dropout. Could Jamie have fallen under his influence and been forced to cover up for him?

synopses.ninety: Mullett becomes convinced Frost's life is in danger.
synopses.epg: Mullett becomes convinced the detective's life is in danger, and with Jack now trying to bring two killers to justice, tragedy cannot be far ahead.

synopses.ninety: While staying with a recently widowed friend, Miss Marple meets a charming young drifter.
synopses.epg: While staying with a recently widowed friend, Miss Marple meets charming young drifter Mike Rogers. Then events take a sinister turn when a dangerous killer strikes.

synopses.ninety: Returning to Styles, Poirot must summon the last of his strength to confront his nemesis.
synopses.epg: Final episode of the detective drama based on Agatha Christie's novels. Hercule Poirot must summon strength to confront his nemesis, as he returns to Styles with Captain Hastings.

synopses.ninety: After an intense ending to the party, Spencer tries to focus on the homecoming game.
synopses.epg: After an intense ending to the party, Spencer attempts to focus on the homecoming game, Billy and Olivia do what they think is right, and Layla drops an unexpected bombshell.

synopses.ninety: Angela struggles to find proof of what Olivier and Theo did to her.
synopses.epg: Angela struggles to find proof of what Olivier and Theo did to her. She must use every bit of her strength, cunning and intelligence to beat Olivier once and for all.

synopses.ninety: Will Anne and the families finally get the truth after 23 years?
synopses.epg: A new panel is created to re-examine Hillsborough. Will Anne and the families finally get the truth after 23 years?

synopses.ninety: Janet's involvement in Fred West's case may have shattering consequences for her.
synopses.epg: Janet Leach has been asked to be serial killer Fred West "appropriate adult", but her involvement in Fred's case may have shattering consequences for her.

synopses.ninety: Alison is faced with an extraordinary choice.

synopses.ninety: Barry wonders which of the lads he should choose as his best man.
synopses.epg: Barry wonders which of the lads he should choose as his best man. While Ally is away, Oz takes the opportunity to get close to Vicki.

synopses.ninety: Deserted by her allies, Elizabeth enters a dangerous game of cat and mouse.
synopses.epg: Deserted by her allies and left out in the cold, Elizabeth enters a dangerous game of cat and mouse and is driven to turn to an unexpected source of support.

synopses.ninety: Lisa is lured back into prostitution by her former pimp Charlie.
synopses.epg: Lisa is lured back into prostitution by her former pimp Charlie, and Raymond seeks revenge for his betrayal.

synopses.ninety: The time has come for Ryu to leave Eden Hall.
synopses.epg: The time has come for Ryu to leave Eden Hall, as he continues his journey through life in another bar.

synopses.ninety: After several days and nights in the cell, John works out who has betrayed him.
synopses.epg: After several days and nights in the cell, John works out who has betrayed him - meanwhile, Daniel, Margaret and Chandrika desperately try to help him.

synopses.ninety: When another body is discovered, Jo realises that her husband's killer is still out there.
synopses.epg: In the conclusion of this three-part thriller, when another body is discovered, Jo realises that her husband's killer is still out there - and closer to home than she'd imagined.

synopses.ninety: Harry is feeling so low he answers a lonely hearts ad in the local newspaper.
synopses.epg: Harry is feeling so low he answers a lonely hearts ad in the local newspaper and seriously contemplates selling the Coaching Inn.  Ken meets with a former lover - at an aerobics class!  This episode also involves a hostage situation.

synopses.ninety: As his life disintegrates, the net begins to close around Peter Manson.

synopses.ninety: Lord Marchmain returns to Brideshead and his presence throws the family into turmoil.

synopses.epg: Vicky is arrested when she takes Maxine to Boston for a puberty blockers assessment. The family are offered support by the court.

synopses.epg: A failed attempt to break into America, more problems with Bobby, and Brian Epstein's troubles threaten to derail Cilla's career for good.

synopses.epg: With his innocence proved by Dr Jeffreys' DNA test, the teenage suspect is released to a storm of controversy. Plus, DCS Baker proposes an extraordinary idea to catch the killer.

synopses.epg: Vicious claims leadership of the Red Dragon Syndicate.

synopses.epg: Fitz returns as the unconventional psychologist who assists police in solving crimes. An ex-soldier is suspected of murder.

synopses.epg: The war escalates and the allies begin to turn against each other.
